reviews.customers_say: Customers find this dress looks expensive and is perfect for spring and summer occasions, with a flattering cut and incredible fit.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stylish, Comfortable and Perfect for a Wedding!
items.body: I was pleasantly surprised by this dress! The price was great, the quality is decent, and I love that there are so many color options to choose from. I’m 7 months pregnant and wearing a medium, it fit comfortably and is flattering without overemphasizing the bump. The flowy, tiered design makes it easy to move in and still feel put together. Perfect as a wedding guest dress, but versatile enough for other special occasions too. Definitely a great find! Read more
items.author: Elizabeth

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great dress!
items.body: Really cute dress! Great color. Good loose fit but not too baggy. Good mid-calf length. Hangs well. Read more
items.author: brambok

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gorgeous last minute purchase and it saved me!
items.body: I was panicking last minute before my sister’s Mexico beach wedding because the dress I had was so unflattering. My daughter got an Amazon and found this gem and it was perfection! It was the perfect color and the perfect shape. The quality is great, does not look cheap, I’m normally an Anthropologie girly, I don’t like cheap materials lol. I do not wear sleeveless because of excess skin from weigh loss, this dress covered all of it, it goes really high up on the armpit and back fat area. I wore pasties as it comes with a lining bra. I usually wear a Medium but I went with a Large and I’m glad because it was comfortable and loose and airy. I’m 5’3, 175 lbs. I now want to buy this dress in multiple colors! Read more
items.author: FruFru Mom

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very beautiful dress
items.body: This dress is really beautiful. I bought it for a graduation dress and it was just what I wanted. The material is nice and it fits well although it could probably be a little more fitted. Read more
items.author: SL

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Navy blue tiered midi dress
items.body: Very beautiful dress, fabric is light and flowy, although lining is not too light in weight but it was fine on a hot day in July for a wedding. No beading or glitter. Plain to dress up for wedding or dress down for cocktail party. Love the navy look - such a rich blue. It’s a very flattering fit and very true to size. I got the XL. NOT see through at all. I usually do not wear anything so up high by my neck but this was very comfortable. Extremely happy with this dress and the price was great. Read more
items.author: maria gentile

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great dress!
items.body: This dress fits and looks great! I would say it runs slightly big. I would typically wear a medium in dresses (5'4", 150 lbs) and I'm wearing a small. The fabric is a really good weight, hangs nicely and hides the tummy. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful dress but…
items.body: This dress is so cute and fits true to size, but haven’t worn it because I cannot get the packing wrinkles out. Followed the directions given, didn’t work, washed and dried, nope, steaming didn’t work, even tried ironing, which was tricky with the ‘pleats’ that are supposed to be there. I would have returned if I had not thrown away the original packaging. If someone has a hack to get wrinkles out of polyester- please share. Pictures are of the front of the dress. The back I am not as concerned about since it gets wrinkled when you sit anyway. Color is very nice- not as bright as shown online but not as muted as looks in my photos. Read more
items.author: Ms

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality.
items.body: Excellent. Very cute dress and good quality material. Fits well. Read more
items.author: Rocio Soto

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Sleeveless is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Sleeveless is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Wine, Mint, Lightblue, Apricot, Rose, Darkgreen, Red, Navy, Khaki, Pink, White, Purple, Darkblack, Lightyellow. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
